venue.address_2: (Teele Square; just steps from Davis Square)
venue.name: PJ Ryans

item.description:
PJ Ryans in Teele Square (Somerville) is an out-of-the-way mini Irish pub with good food and a chill crowd. I'll be there from 7:30 - 9:00pm for drinks and some pub grub so please pop in to say hello whenever you can.

Bloco AfroBrazil is a 12-piece percussion ensemble that ROCKED the house with the happiest and most impressive high-energy beats I've heard since a Rusted Root concert over a decade ago. They're playing nearby at 9pm.

So, all those who want to meet me for drinks/apps/meals, please do. At 9pm I will head down the street to Johnny D's to meetup with Tonya & company at the concert/dance party so all those who want to follow me, please do. If you only want to chit-chat and then head home, no worries. Either way, see ya soon!
item.how_to_find_us: Tiny place so it will be easy. Also, I'll send details in an email several hours in advance of the event
item.name: Burgers Before Bloco AfroBrazil
